modShortDescription: This mod adds to the game 6 new perks and quests.
modDescription:
This mod adds to the game 6 new perks and [quests](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-quests/).

* Install with the fixes.
* The mod request [Smx UI](https://7daystodiemods.com/smxui/).

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/9467dx5ri3fvtho/Quest_Perks.rar/file)**

**Credits:** [GodRaiZer](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/godraizer/)
